title: KHR_framebuffer_value_mapping glTF Scene Extension
description: glTF extension that defines the mapping of light intensity values to frambuffer values.

maxLight.description: Light intensity value mapped to max framebuffer value.
maxLight.gltf_detailedDescription: The value defines how calculated light intensity values, in the form of RGB triplets, shall be mapped to the framebuffer. RGB values are scaled by (max_framebuffer_value / maxWhite)
